attributes.additional_details:
I am currently receiving Jobseekers Allowance and have been getting it for some time.
I have been trying very hard to get work but as yet have had no success.
With all my bills and shopping expenses I strongly believe it is not enough to live on as the cost of living is going up all the time.
Could Jobseekers be put up to at least £155 a fortnight so people can make ends meet. You don't realise how hard it is until you are in the situation yourself.

M. Kirk
